name: The Mystery of the Missing Sword: The Conclusion
name_original: The Mystery of the Missing Sword: The Conclusion
description:
Excalibur has been stolen! It is up to you, Merlin's Apprentice, to discover what happened on that night and who is responsible.  Find clues throughout the castle and interview characters to create a conclusion. Can you figure out who is responsible? 

Controls

In 3D environment:

  • Find clues by clicking on them
  • After collecting some clues, players can press E, which will track to another clue
  • Move around using WASD key  
  • Press TAB to open journal

In Journal:

  • Clues tab: Click on unlocked clues to read more information about them.
  • Interview tab: Click on characters to read about what they know, which unlocks clues. 
  • Conclusion tab: Form a conclusion based on what you know. Will lock player in journal if continued. (Making a conclusion will exit the game)
  • X in upper right corner will exit journal and allow player to move around in 3D environment.
